lead_paragraph: The New York City police are seeking a man who grabbed a bucket off the back of a momentarily unattended armored truck in broad daylight and fled, very slowly, with $1.6 million worth of gold flakes.

headline.print_headline: Police Seeking Man in Theft of Gold Flakes
headline.main: No Rainbow, but Thief Finds a Bucket of Gold on West 48th Street

snippet: The New York City police are seeking a man who grabbed a bucket off the back of a momentarily unattended armored truck in broad daylight and fled, very slowly, with $1.6 million worth of gold flakes....
abstract: New York City police seek man caught on surveillance video taking 5-gallon bucket from back of armored truck in Midtown Manhattan; bucket contained 86 pounds of gold flakes worth $1.6 million.
